text: kaho, "ai kitaabavaalo! aao ek aisee baat kee or jise hamaare aur tumhaare beech samaan maanyata praapt hai; yah ki ham allaah ke atirikt kisee kee bandagee na karen aur na usake saath kisee cheez ko saajhee thaharaen aur na paraspar hamamen se koee ek-doosare ko allaah se hatakar rab banae." phir yadi ve munh mode to kah do, "gavaah raho, ham to muslim (aagyaakaaree) hai.
